attributes.action: Introduce National Insurance Number Based Identity Cards which identify clearly UK and non UK citizens that live permanently or temporarily in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently NHS and other services are being used by Non-UK Citizens who may not be entitled to such services.  If identity cards, passports and services are linked by the same number e.g. National Insurance Number - then services can be allocated to those who are entitled.  Crime detection and prevention will also be easier, isn't it a shame when you have clear pictures on crimewatch, but no-one in authority can identify who the criminals are?

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/passcard/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
